summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York (SDNY) personnel discussing a potential 60 Minutes feature on Jeffrey Epstein. The emails show internal communication about media coverage following Epstein's death.

events.title: Internal DOJ email about 60 Minutes feature
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY personnel exchange emails about hearing that 60 Minutes might run a feature on Jeffrey Epstein that Sunday night.

keyFacts: Internal DOJ/SDNY email chain discusses potential 60 Minutes media coverage of Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication occurred on January 3, 2020, shortly after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The emails show coordination and information sharing about media coverage within the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The subject line 'Re: Epstein' indicates ongoing discussions about Epstein-related matters within the office.
The document reveals internal awareness of upcoming media scrutiny following Epstein's death.
